description: Great tasting and easy to prepare.
name: Corn Flake Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs olive oil, for frying (or butter)

recipeInstructions.text: In a ziplock bag add corn flakes and seasoning. Crush mixture to desired texture.
Once you have crushed the corn flakes add to a bowl or plate (whichever you'd prefer).
Place flour in to a bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs.
Cover tenderloin in flour, dip in egg, then coat in corn flake mix and set aside on a plate. Repeat with the remaining tenderloins.
Once you have coated all tenderloins cook in fry pan with either butter or oil until cooked through.
